meanings.definition: A type of fungus that grows on snow.
meanings.sent1: The snowmolds covered the entire field after the snow melted.
meanings.sent2: I learned about snowmolds in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The snowmolds seemed to be having a little snow party on the icy surface.
meanings.sent4: The snowmolds spread like a cozy blanket over the white landscape.
meanings.sent5: The snowmolds looked like tiny white mushrooms dotting the snow-covered ground.

meanings.definition: The plural form of snowmold, referring to multiple instances of the fungus.
meanings.sent1: We found various snowmolds in different parts of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied the different types of snowmolds found in the region.
meanings.sent3: The snowmolds in the forest were having a little family reunion.
meanings.sent4: The snowmolds covered the slopes like a patchwork quilt.
meanings.sent5: The snowmolds created a beautiful pattern on the snowy ground.
